name: Wealthy
description: Start each match with an extra 20 gp.

name: Swift
description: Add 10ft to your base movement speed.

name: Tactician
description: Gain +5 to all your initiative rolls.

name: Enduring
description: Gain an extra 3 max HP and 1 AC.

name: Long Description
description: Extra long description. Extra long description. Extra long description.
